member.param: the user id of the user
member.returns: True if the current user is inserted otherwise false

member.summary: Pefrom all the database interaction when the user logs in. In addition to that, the code written here is bad practice. This should be written in async but fvck I don't want to hahaah. It works anyway lol
member.returns: True if the user has logged in otherwise false
